title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       The Museum Shop and Visitor Center at 103 Orchard Street are open from 10 am to 6:30 pm, Monday through Wednesday and Friday through Sunday. On Thursdays the hours of operation are 10 am to 8:30 pm. The Museum Shop and Visitor Center is closed on Christmas, Thanksgiving, and New Year's Day.  Tours are offered from 10am to 5pm, except on Thursdays when tours begin at 6:30 pm. Tour times and daily offerings vary. Please visit http://tenement.org/tours.php for exact times and availability. Building and exhibit tours are offered year-round, and neighborhood walking tours are offered all year except for January, February, and the first two weeks of March.   Advance reservations are recommended but not required.
